name: Story 2: Party On A Friday Night
name_original: Story 2: Party On A Friday Night
description:
So, this one is less polished because I was at my friend's house and I still wanted to try though. Not thrilled with the results but I still make it!

Pitch:
This party isn't like any others.

Recommended song: Wish You Were Here by Pink Flyod.

Cover: by Junji Ito, and is one of his many watercolors work.
